name: Yet Another Office Quest
description:
Yes. It's Yet Another Office Quest.

The game is a 3D quest game set in an office.
It is your first day as the office IT expert and as you first task, you have to fix your boss's computer after office hours or YOU'RE FIRED!

Check post it notes, find out passwords to log in to employee's computers and find out who has the boss's password.

Please enjoy this state of the art, fully immersive, complete 3D game, which is clearly complete, polished and with no bugs what-so-ever!
